title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.5 - Public use of cliff lake
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.5 - Public use of cliff lake

State Regulations
(a) Pedestrian access to Cliff Lake is permitted from May 1st through November 30th
for fishing only, and is permitted only from the designated parking area on

Sands Road via the marked road to the designated boat access site located at
the southwest portion of Cliff Lake. (b) Vessels may only be launched and
retrieved at the designated boat access site. (c) Shoreline fishing is permitted only at
the designated boat access site. (d) Access to and use of Cliff Lake is
prohibited from one-half hour after sunset to one-half hour before
sunrise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
113.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
